contactUsCmpTitle: Tailored Solutions for Your Business Needs
contactUsCmpContent: We understand that every business is unique, and that's why we take a customized approach to software development. Our team collaborates closely with you to identify your requirements, analyze your industry landscape, and design software solutions that align with your goals, ensuring a solution that fits your business like a glove.
getStartedCmpTitle: Get Started with Transformative Software Development Solutions
getStartedCmpContent: Contact us today to explore how our blockchain development solutions can revolutionize your business. Let's embark on a transformative journey together.
title: Let’s talk about your project
introduction: At 4i Tech, we're ready to discuss your project. Whether you're a startup or an enterprise, let's explore your software development needs together. Fill out the form below, and we'll promptly schedule a chat.
formInfoDescription: For your convenience, you can reach us by phone at our office line, or simply fill in the form below, and we'll be in touch shortly
formAdress2: 19625 Glen Una Dr., Saratoga, CA 95070, U. S. A.
formAdress3: 3F, N. 2, Ruiguang Rd., Neihu Dist. 11491 Taipei City, Taiwan, R. O. C.
formAdress4: 3F, N. 2, Ruiguang Rd., Neihu Dist. 11491 Taipei City, Taiwan, R. O. C.
questionDescription: Explore common queries about our services, processes, and more in our FAQ section.
questionAwnser1: 4i Tech offers a wide range of software development services, including custom software development, mobile app development, web development, CRM and ERP solutions, and software outsourcing.
question2: How can I request a quote for a project?
questionAwnser2: Requesting a quote is easy. Simply fill out the inquiry form, and one of our representatives will get in touch with you shortly to discuss your project details and provide a customized quote.
question3: Can you handle projects of all sizes?
questionAwnser3: Yes, we cater to projects of all sizes, from small startups to large enterprises. Our team is equipped to scale resources based on your project's requirements.
question4: Do you provide ongoing support and maintenance?
questionAwnser4: Absolutely. We offer post-launch support and maintenance services to ensure your software remains up-to-date and functional. Our dedicated support team is available to assist you.
question5: How do you ensure data security and confidentiality?
questionAwnser5: We take data security seriously. We implement robust security measures and confidentiality agreements to protect your sensitive information. Your data is safe with us.
question6: Can you assist with software integration and system upgrades?
questionAwnser6: Yes, we provide integration services, including CRM, ERP, and third-party system integration. We can also assist with system upgrades and migrations to keep your software current and efficient.
